segments.text: do you have any plans for dinner tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , I was thinking of putting a frozen pizza in the oven or something . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking maybe we could make dinner together tonight . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could teach you how to cook something healthy . Frozen pizza are so bad for you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know they aren't good for me , but they are cheap , convenient , and fairly tasty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I recently saw a piece for spicy chicken curry in a magadize . Maybe we could try that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , why not . Do you have all the ingredients ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought all the ingredients this morning , so let's start !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: first , you need to wash the vegetables and then chop them into little pieces .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . Should I heat the wok ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes . Once it gets hot , put a little oil in it , add the vegetables and stir-fry them for a few minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that needs to be cut into thin strips about 3 cm long and then it can be stir-fried on its own until its cooked through .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll prepare it . Do you prefer white rice or brown rice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: white rice , please . None of that healthy brown stuff for me !
segments.speaker: S2
